definition[0]: a dangerous action that is done to entertain people, especially in a film
example[0]: Not many actors do their own stunts.
definition[1]: something that is done to attract people’s attention, especially in advertising or politics
example[2]: Todd flew over the city in a hot-air balloon as a publicity stunt.
definition[2]: to stop something or someone from growing to their full size or developing properly
example[3]: Lack of sunlight will stunt the plant’s growth.
definition[3]: something that is done to attract people’s attention to a product or company
example[4]: The companies turned the event into a publicity stunt.
example[5]: They deliberately created a controversial commercial as a stunt to get free publicity.
